newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Bank Negara 91-day bills average yield 6.376 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bank Negara 91-day bills average yield 6.376 pct.

text.p: Malaysia's central bank said on Tuesday it accepted bids at an average yield of 6.376 percent at its auction of 91-day Bank Negara bills for one billion ringgit.
At its previous auction of 91-day Bank Negara bills for 500 million ringgit on March 4, the central bank accepted bids at an average yield of 6.343 percent.
The bids accepted were in a high/low range of 6.399/349 percent against 6.385/280 previously.
The payment for the issue is on Wednesday and will be met by maturing issues totalling 1.5 billion ringgit.
